Hey, it's IndieWeb Carnival time and this is my first participation.  Following on the tragedy in the United States this week, there's no better time to talk about "Impact"â€”your impact, however small or insignificant you think it is, other people's impact, the impacts of the powerful (and how your impact can couple with that)â€”I might get a little spicy.
